tool_description: Evaluates and scores vendors based on multiple criteria including reputation, experience, reviews, certifications, and service quality metrics.

vendor_ids.description: List of vendor identifiers to evaluate

evaluation_criteria.description: Criteria for evaluation (reputation, experience, reviews, certifications, etc.)

criteria_weights.description: Weight values for each criterion (must correspond to evaluation_criteria order)

minimum_score_threshold.description: Minimum acceptable score for vendor consideration (0-100)

error_messages: Criteria-weights mismatch: The number of evaluation_criteria must match the number of criteria_weights.
Invalid weight values: All criteria_weights must be positive numbers and should sum to approximately 100.
Vendor evaluation failed: Unable to retrieve sufficient data for one or more vendors.
Threshold out of range: minimum_score_threshold must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide vendor_ids, evaluation_criteria, and corresponding criteria_weights. Optionally set minimum_score_threshold. The tool scores each vendor and ranks them based on weighted criteria.

vendor_scores.description: Overall scores for each vendor in the same order as input

qualified_vendors.description: Vendors meeting the minimum score threshold

evaluation_summary.description: Summary of evaluation results and vendor rankings
